mapper.select: SELECT c.`name` AS constructionName, r.`name` as equipmentName, f.user_id userId, f.user_name userName, f.id_card AS idCard, f.result as result, f.score as score, f.collection_time AS collectionTime FROM t_basic_face f LEFT JOIN t_basic_construction c ON c.id = f.construction_id left JOIN t_basic_equipment_register r on f.equipment_id=r.id where f.equipment_id=#{equipmentId} order by f.create_time desc
SELECT count(1) FROM t_basic_face f LEFT JOIN t_basic_construction c ON c.id = f.construction_id left JOIN t_basic_equipment_register r on f.equipment_id=r.id where f.equipment_id=#{equipmentId}
